## Digital Watermarking Security Policy
This project provides a **copyright protection service** for open-source projects. It is not a steganography tool.
### Usage Policy
- Only for verifying ownership of open-source assets
- All watermarks contain `GH:project-id` identifiers
- No hidden data is stored or transmitted
### Reporting Security Issues
All operations are recorded in GitHub Issues with `watermark-usage` label.  
To verify a watermark: [https://your-repo.netlify.app/verify](https://your-repo.netlify.app/verify)
